Posts.EditableText:
To beta test what precisely? 

A text-adventure? A visual novel? A pornographic experience?

If you could provide more details on:
1) What you want beta testers to test?
2) What are the credentials needed by a tester; ie NDA or they've tested a game before.
3) How they would provide feedback or bug reports to you?

Posts.EditableText: This game is a for all ages text based game called 'farm life.' I would like testers that have tested or made at least one game. You can provide feed back in the game comments.
Posts.HTML: This game is a for all ages text based game called 'farm life.' I would like testers that have tested or made at least one game. You can provide feed back in the game comments.
